name: SimpleMotivationalMessage
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i am not motivated
des: Simple Motivational Message is a basic alexa app. It'll tell you a motivational message if you say "Alexa, i am not motivated". It's perfect for these days when you feel lazy and need an extra motivational help. Simple Motivational Message works in all alexa devices, because it's a very simple app. Discover the message just saying "Alexa, i am not motivated" and keep motivated!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
